definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

sentences.english: Well, I plan on joining the wind ensemble in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 我準備春天參加管樂合奏團。

sentences.english: Worship services, choir, and music ensembles are easily mixed and recorded live.
sentences.chinese: 崇拜服務，合唱團，和音樂合奏容易混合和錄製現場。

sentences.english: Schwimmer was the first actor in the ensemble cast to be hired.
sentences.chinese: 修蒙是在合奏第一的演員被錄用。

sentences.english: Besides, he is the Vice-Chairman of the Hong Kong Wind Ensemble Association.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，蔡氏亦是香港管樂合奏協會的副主席。

sentences.english: The melody is next taken up by flutes.
They duetted a musical composition with violin and piano.
sentences.chinese: 他們用小提琴和鋼琴合奏出一首二重奏曲。

sentences.english: Yangyang:I play the vilon. Let's play together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 我拉小提琴，改天咱們一起合奏吧。

sentences.english: Besides being a soloist, Amy is also an avid chamber musician and worked on Ensemble and Chamber Music intensively.
sentences.chinese: 譚氏不單是一名獨奏家，她還熱心於室樂演奏和合奏。

sentences.english: During the Warring States Period (475-221BC), the King of the State of Qi was very fond of listening to yu ensembles.
sentences.chinese: 戰國時，齊宣王喜歡聽竽，通常是三百人的大合奏。

sentences.english: But remember both keys are played together to give sweet music.
sentences.chinese: 然則，要記着只要詬誶鍵的合奏能力彈出美好的音樂。

sentences.english: The melody is next taken up by the flutes.
sentences.chinese: 這主調接著由橫笛合奏。

sentences.english: Below Secondo Items Are For Duet Entry Participant Only.
sentences.chinese: 以下合奏參賽者資料只供二重奏參賽者填寫。

sentences.english: Directions: Choose one large ensemble from below which is included in your tuition package.
sentences.chinese: 古典樂與爵士樂的學費中已包含大合奏課的學費？

sentences.english: The composer has arranged Chopin's nocturnes for the full orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 這位作曲家已將肖邦的小夜曲改編爲合奏曲。

sentences.english: And if you like, you can match the ensemble with yellows or even reds.
sentences.chinese: 如果您願意，可以匹配的合奏與黃色，甚至紅色。

sentences.english: I love to play in all types of ensembles.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡參與吹奏各種各樣的合奏曲。

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
zhongruan or alto lute, like pipa 琵琶 but bigger and lower range
